the Rider of [[Rohan]]: caption=Harding from ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''

{{disambig-two: '''Harding''' was a man of [[Rohan]] during the [[War of the Ring]].
Harding fought and died in the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]]. His name is remembered in the poem [[Song of the Mounds of Mundburg]].<ref>{{RK
[[Old English]] ''hearding'' means "hard one, strong one".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names</ref>
'''2012: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Riders of Rohan]]'':'''
:Harding is Aldor of East Rohan, overseeing [[the Wold]] and the Eastemnet. He dwells in the village of Harwick, the main settlement of the Wold.
